alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 10:48PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Monroe County through 1115 PM EDT... At 1048 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pocono Pines, or 7 miles west of Mount Pocono, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Pocono, Tobyhanna, Paradise Valley, Pocono Pines, Gouldsboro State Park, Skytop, Arrowhead Lake, Mountainhome, Canadensis and Cresco. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 288 and 293. Interstate 380 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 2 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
